column4: Your most valuable asset... your hand.
Stick with a sharp and pointy edge.
Used for chopping logs... in this case logs are heads.
It's like a sword... but curved.
Really long stick with a sharp and pointy edge.
Just for the nail in your enemy's coffin.
Shoots a stick with a sharp and pointy edge.
Shoots a stick with a sharp and pointy edge... but better.
Blocks incoming attacks for a short period of time.
